short_summary: This is a request for proposals RFP against Supply Arrangement E2225-152290 for Architecture Consulting Services.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada PSPC on behalf of Correctional Service Canada CSC require architectural services for the design and Class A cost estimate to upgrade/downgrade and converting/to convert two T two F existing Living Unit cells intoToOne accessible cell.
duration_in_months: It will last for arund 37 months
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Information

* **Contract Title:** Shepody Accessibility Upgrade
* **Location:** Dorchester, New Brunswick
* **Project Description:** Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking architectural services for the design and Class A cost estimate to upgrade and convert two existing Living Unit cells into one accessible cell at the Shepody Health Center, Dorchester Penitentiary.

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference #:** WS4391999563
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4391999563
* **Publication Date:** January 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 2, 2024, 2:00 PM (ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** February 2, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2027

#### Procurement Information

* **Trade Agreements:** The bid is open to firms eligible under the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA).
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Traditional
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Grant, Stewart (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email:** [stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stewart.grant@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone:** Not Available
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Note

* Bidders who wish to request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation should make the request to the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Reference the solicitation for further details. 

As per the original message, I could not write more than 400 words.
